title: Anaconda
data:
***Version [0.26](/0.26 "0.26")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all snakes, see [list of snakes](/List_of_snakes "List of snakes").*

| anaconda S [![Anaconda.png](/images/a/a4/Anaconda.png)](/File:Anaconda.png) |                                                                                        |

| Attack2                                                                     | 20 ([bite](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))     |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A very large snake that moves with startling swiftness. It kills not by poison but by constricting its prey.***“The latter lived in the country, and before his house there was an oak, in which there was a lair of snakes. His servants killed the snakes, but Melampus gathered wood and burnt the reptiles, and reared the young ones. And when the young were full grown, they stood beside him at each of his shoulders as he slept, and they purged his ears with their tongues. He started up in a great fright, but understood the voices of the birds flying overhead, and from what he learned from them he foretold to men what should come to pass.” -Pseudo-Apollodorus , \_Library and Epitome\_, 1.9.11. circa 150 BC. trans. Sir James George Frazer, 1913. “A snake, with mottles rare, Surveyed my chamber floor, In feature as the worm before, But ringed with power.” -Emily Dickinson, “In Winter In My Room”. circa 1860. |

## Useful Info

**Anacondas** are extremely fast, non-venomous [constricting](/Constriction "Constriction") snakes which deal significant damage in melee. They annihilate lightly-armoured casters foolish enough to let them get close, and are a risk to anyone else who can't kill them quickly. They can be found in some vaults (e.g. one of the possible endings of [the Lair](/The_Lair "The Lair")) and more commonly in [the Snake Pits](/The_Snake_Pits "The Snake Pits").

## Tips & Tricks

While anacondas do a lot of damage, they lack poison resistance. [Curare](/Curare "Curare") [darts](/Dart "Dart") are quite effective. If it managed to get close and constrict you, you can always try [Mephitic Cloud](/Mephitic_Cloud "Mephitic Cloud"). Like other snakes, they have poor [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower"), so a [wand of paralysis](/Wand_of_paralysis "Wand of paralysis") or the like will also work.

## History

- In [0.10](/0.10 "0.10"), anacondas got a bite attack. Previously, they could only constrict their enemies.
- Prior to [0.7](/0.7 "0.7"), anacondas weren't amphibious.
html:
Anaconda

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.26: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all snakes, see list of snakes.

anaconda S 
HP 39-81
HD 11
XP 924
Speed 18
AC 4
EV 16
Will 40
Attack1 6 (constrict: crush)
Attack2 20 (bite: plain)


Resistances rDrown
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Amphibious
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Large
Type snake, anaconda
Flags Cold-blooded
A very large snake that moves with startling swiftness. It kills not by poison but by constricting its prey.

“The latter lived in the country, and before his house there was an oak, in which there was a lair of snakes. His servants killed the snakes, but Melampus gathered wood and burnt the reptiles, and reared the young ones. And when the young were full grown, they stood beside him at each of his shoulders as he slept, and they purged his ears with their tongues. He started up in a great fright, but understood the voices of the birds flying overhead, and from what he learned from them he foretold to men what should come to pass.”
-Pseudo-Apollodorus , _Library and Epitome_, 1.9.11. circa 150 BC.
trans. Sir James George Frazer, 1913.

“A snake, with mottles rare,
Surveyed my chamber floor,
In feature as the worm before,
But ringed with power.”
-Emily Dickinson, “In Winter In My Room”. circa 1860.

Useful Info

Anacondas are extremely fast, non-venomous constricting snakes which deal significant damage in melee. They annihilate lightly-armoured casters foolish enough to let them get close, and are a risk to anyone else who can't kill them quickly. They can be found in some vaults (e.g. one of the possible endings of the Lair) and more commonly in the Snake Pits.

Tips & Tricks

While anacondas do a lot of damage, they lack poison resistance. Curare darts are quite effective. If it managed to get close and constrict you, you can always try Mephitic Cloud. Like other snakes, they have poor willpower, so a wand of paralysis or the like will also work.

History

  • In 0.10, anacondas got a bite attack. Previously, they could only constrict their enemies.
  • Prior to 0.7, anacondas weren't amphibious.
